author: Tyler Payne
comment: Ive been looking for a photo widget, mainly to display pictures of my girlfriend on my phone but once I realized how helpful this can be besides my original intentions, im excited for a non demo version. So heres the actual stuff, keeping in mind its a demo... the picture quality is a tad shotty and a demo version band appears over the pictures. Not a problem since it only shows when full size. The one thing I really can complain about is the lack of being able to select gallery photos. Excited for the full
title: Something ive been looking for.
